edu.swarthmore.cs.spoon.interfaces

Interface Inventory


  • public interface Inventory
    Keeps track of all the items that a player is currently carrying

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addItem(Item item, int quantity)
      Adds the specified item to the inventory
      java.util.List<Item> getItems()
      Returns a list of all the items in the inventory
      java.util.List<javafx.util.Pair<Item,java.lang.Integer>> getItemsWithQuantities()
      Returns a list of pairs of the items in the inventory and the quantities of each item
      int getQuantityOfItem(Item item)
      getter for the quantity of a particular item that the inventory contains
      java.lang.Boolean hasItem(Item item)
      Checks whether the inventory contains a particular item
      Item removeAllOfItem(Item item)
      Removes all of the specified item from the inventory, and returns it (or null if that item was not in the inventory)
      Item removeItem(Item item, int quantity)
      Removes the specified quantity of the specified item from the inventory, and returns it (or null if that item was not in the inventory)

    • Method Detail

      • getItems

        java.util.List<Item> getItems()
        Returns a list of all the items in the inventory
        Returns:
        a list of items that is the contents of the inventory

      • getItemsWithQuantities

        java.util.List<javafx.util.Pair<Item,java.lang.Integer>> getItemsWithQuantities()
        Returns a list of pairs of the items in the inventory and the quantities of each item
        Returns:
        a list of pairs of items and their quantities

      • addItem

        void addItem(Item item,
             int quantity)
        Adds the specified item to the inventory
        Parameters:
        item - the Item to be added
        quantity - the amount of that Item to be added

      • removeItem

        Item removeItem(Item item,
                int quantity)
        Removes the specified quantity of the specified item from the inventory, and returns it (or null if that item was not in the inventory)
        Parameters:
        item - the item to be removed
        quantity - the amount of that item to be removed
        Returns:
        item, the item that was removed, or null if item was not in the inventory

      • removeAllOfItem

        Item removeAllOfItem(Item item)
        Removes all of the specified item from the inventory, and returns it (or null if that item was not in the inventory)
        Parameters:
        item - the item to be removed
        Returns:
        item, the item that was removed, or null if item was not in the inventory

      • hasItem

        java.lang.Boolean hasItem(Item item)
        Checks whether the inventory contains a particular item
        Parameters:
        item - the item to check
        Returns:
        true if the inventory has that item, false if it does not

      • getQuantityOfItem

        int getQuantityOfItem(Item item)
        getter for the quantity of a particular item that the inventory contains
        Parameters:
        item - -the item to check the quantity of
        Returns:
        an int that is the amount of that item that the inventory has. If it doesn't have any, return 0
